title: Innovative Startups to Watch in June 2024
author: Hina Sato
content: In June 2024, several startups have emerged with innovative solutions that promise to disrupt various industries. One such startup, EcoTech, is revolutionizing the renewable energy sector with its advanced solar panels. Another notable mention is HealthAI, which uses artificial intelligence to enhance diagnostic accuracy in healthcare. These startups are not only pushing the boundaries of technology but also addressing critical global challenges. Stay tuned as we continue to follow their progress and impact.
